snippet.title: Zoonomaly - Official Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Over the last several months, I have been finishing the development of my game "Zoonomaly" and I'm so excited to share the first trailer with you! 

PLAY ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2101890/Zoonomaly/

- Zoonomaly is a puzzle based survival horror game set in an open world zoo. You must survive a monster infested zoo while searching for key shards that unlock the truth to its origin. Collect all the key shards by solving puzzles throughout the grounds and put a stop to the monster mayhem. -


LIGHTS ARE OFF brings nightmares to life with 3D animation! 
TIKTOK: https://www.tiktok.com/@lights.are.off?lang=en
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/lights.are.off/
